content:
I'd be happy to help you with your shopping list.

To get started, can you tell me a bit more about the family gathering? How many people will be attending, and what's the general vibe of the event? Is it a casual potluck, or is your aunt providing most of the food?

Also, do you have any specific dishes or items that you're responsible for bringing? And are there any dietary restrictions or preferences you need to consider (e.g. vegetarian, gluten-free, etc.)?
